text: Is indentation so very important in python?
I am learning this stuff because google app engine doesn't allow php.

childList.text: I am learning this stuff because google app engine doesn't allow php.

text: Python is touted to be an easy and friendly language to use.
But I find trying to tamper with an existing code causes indentation errors.

For example:
this piece of code

code:
class SearchThread(Thread):
  def __init__(self, s, q):
   Thread.__init__(self)
    self.s = s
    self.q = q
    self.results = []

class SearchThread(Thread):
  def __init__(self, s, q):
    Thread.__init__(self)
    self.s = s
    self.q = q
    self.results = []

text: I think having spaces is pretty neat.
It never struck me that spaces could be used in the place of braces.
